preqs: MGB2430, MGC2430, MGG2430, MGF2661 or MGW2430

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGC2430, MGF2661} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB2430, MGC2430, MGF2661, MGG2430, MGW2430} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}

description: This unit identifies and develops the thinking skills that enable the formulation of innovative HR strategies that advance organisational needs and objectives to achieve sustainable competitive advantage by critically examining the relationship between HRM and organisational strategies. Topics typically include: the external and global environment for HRM, the dynamics of industry-based competition, strategic flexibility, and characteristics of innovative and value-adding HR practices and systems.
